thread.title: The Queen of Instagram Is Back! Check out Kim Kardashian’s First Instagram Picture!
thread.title_full: The Queen of Instagram Is Back! Check out Kim Kardashian’s First Instagram Picture!

author: Emily Hingle
title: The Queen of Instagram Is Back! Check out Kim Kardashian’s First Instagram Picture!
text:
The Queen of Instagram Is Back! Check out Kim Kardashian’s First Instagram Picture! Jan 3, 2017 at 5:00   We're happy to see her back again! 
We’ve waited for 13 excruciating weeks to hear something from the First Lady of Social Media, and she’s finally answered our prayers. We’ve only had professional shots of her incredible fashions to look at, but her latest post shows that she’s not as concerned about what she’s wearing, and there are far more important things in her life right now. This must be due to all of the craziness she’s been through for the past few months. Advertisement Credit: DFree/ Shutterstock 
After a long hiatus from all social media, Kim Kardashian is ready to start posting to Instagram again. You can see her first post in months right now! Will this be a new era for the social media maven and her family?
